name: Octillery
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

attacks.name: Switch Cannon
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Switch Octillery with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ink Bomb
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
